original_title: Pastor Jerome leaves the country ahead of CID probe
original_body_lines: Pastor Jerome Fernando who now faces a CID investigation over his controversial remarks made against Buddhism, Islam and Hinduism left the country today morning, a close source to the Pastor confirmed to Daily Mirror.
Jerome left for Singapore in the early hours of today and will leave for another destination soon.
The source said he has multiple visas to two other countries at least and he is expected to leave for either one of them.

However, authorities are yet to officially confirm that Jerome has left the country as the Immigration Dept and sources at the BIA said they had no information of whether the self-proclaimed Prophet had left. (Susitha Fernando)
